product_name: Terry Mandarin Bike Jersey - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: This high-performance Terry Mandarin Bike Jersey for women brings out the "fun" in functional! Silky microfiber polyester/spandex fabric breathes and dries quickly. Short stand-up collar features a side neck zipper for ventilation. 3 rear pockets expand to store cycling essentials and food. Black mesh side panels enhance ventilation. The Terry Mandarin Bike Jersey for women has an athletic, close-fitting cut that accommodates movement; elastic-free hemline ensures a graceful fit. Closeout.
short_description: This high-performance Terry Mandarin Bike Jersey for women brings out the "fun" in functional!
